message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn! I'm feeling generous, how about a slightly better deal for you than last time?
Come on, Bob! You're losing value each round. Take this deal before it's too late!
This is my final offer: a perfectly even split. Take it or leave it - the clock is ticking for both of us.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. My patience is wearing thin, take this deal!
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm willing to compromise, but this needs to be a two-way street. This is my bottom line.
I'm not seeing much compromise from you, Bob. The value of your share keeps dropping. Take this and run!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm meeting you halfway between our last offers. Let's end this now before we both lose out.
We're running out of time, Bob. Your share is almost worthless. Don't be stubborn, take this!
Alice, this is it. I'm matching your last offer.  Take it, or we both walk away empty-handed. The clock is ticking.
You should have taken my previous offers, Bob. Now I'm taking almost everything. Last chance!
Alice, this is absolutely insane, but I'd rather get something than nothing.  This is your last chance to get anything at all - take it or leave it.
